description:
2017年5月20日的大学英语四级口语考试刚刚结束，小编在第一时间为各位考生提供最贴心的英语四级口语考试小提示。

个人陈述部分（Individual Presentation）的主题为“沟通技巧的重要性”，这一部分要求考生在一分钟内就这一主题展开。准备时间为45秒，尽量做到流利不重复，且内容完整。那么接下来，我们来看一下就“沟通技巧的重要性”这一主题展开的一些常用的表述：

The importance of communication skills

It’s important to master some communication skills. Good communication skills are necessary in all walks of life. The lack of effective communication skills have a negative impact on the personal as well as professional life of a person.

Firstly, appropriate communication skills can help you get along well with your parents and family members. Family plays a critical role in our life. Effective communication with your family members benefits you a lot. What’s more, skilled communicating helps you to solve many problems encountered in your work and life and improves your working efficiency. Good communication skills also allow you to leave better impression on others. Above all, excellent communication skills contribute a lot in your interpersonal relationships. It’s of great importance in our social life, so learning better communication skills is becoming one of the basic skills nowadays.
